name: The Devil
description: The Devil card in the Adventure Time Tarot represents addiction, control, and limitations. It challenges you to recognize unhealthy patterns and regain your personal power.

attributes.value: Addiction, control, materialism, restriction, and temptation.
Breaking free, self-awareness, overcoming addiction, reclaiming power.
Identify the chains holding you back. You have the strength to break free and reclaim your autonomy.
